pullRequest.body:
Co-authored-by: Patience Ablett
Co-authored-by: Kevin Buzzard
Co-authored-by: Harald Carlens
Co-authored-by: Wayne Ng Kwing King
Co-authored-by: Michael Schlößer
Co-authored-by: Justus Springer
Co-authored-by: Jujian Zhang

This contribution was created as part of the Durham Computational Algebraic Geometry Workshop

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: Looking at "Import changes for all files", I think almost no other files are affected so it should be fine.
Can you break this in two somehow? It's slightly on the long side. And also merge master so we can actually see the imports?

### PR summary [4f74319ea0](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/20315/commits/4f74319ea0869336b523ac012d76797bbd981e52)

Import changes exceeding 2%

| %      | File |
| -      | -    |
| +30.68% | `Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization.Basic` |

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization.Basic | 414 | 541 | +127 (+30.68%) |
| Mathlib.RingTheory.GradedAlgebra.HomogeneousLocalization | 1163 | 1166 | +3 (+0.26%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
|<details><summary>4 files</summary> `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.Basic` `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.Proper` `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.Scheme` `Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.ProjectiveSpectrum.StructureSheaf`</details>|1|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.GradedAlgebra.HomogeneousLocalization`|3|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.Localization.Defs`|38|
| `Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization.Away`|43|
| `Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization.MonoidWithZero`|124|
| `Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization.Order`|125|
| `Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization.Basic`|127|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.GradedAlgebra.FiniteType` (new file)|1223|

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ Away.adjoin_mk_prod_pow_eq_top`
`+ Away.adjoin_mk_prod_pow_eq_top_of_pos`
`+ Away.finiteType`
`+ Away.span_mk_prod_pow_eq_top`
`+ GradedAlgebra.exists_finset_adjoin_eq_top_and_homogeneous`
`+ GradedAlgebra.exists_finset_adjoin_eq_top_and_homogeneous_ne_zero`
`+ algebraMap_apply`
`+ coe_decompose_mul_of_left_mem_zero`
`+ coe_decompose_mul_of_right_mem_zero`
`+ coe_mul_of_apply_of_mem_zero`
`+ coe_of_mul_apply_of_mem_zero`
`+ instance : Algebra (A 0) R := (SetLike.GradeZero.subalgebra A).toAlgebra`
`+ mk_prod`
`+ prod_attach_eq_prod_dite`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

pullRequest.title: feat(RingTheory): homogeneous localization away from an element is of finite type
